column1: The Pit Room////Absolutely awesome. I was visiting Houston
column2: and wanted some real good Texas BBQ. Man. The food had so much flavor! Everything was hot and fresh. It was divine. The atmosphere is awesome. We heard there's usually long
column3: long lines. We went on a Thursday evening
column5: and there was a bit of a line out the door to order. We didn't wait very long
column6: but the wait was well worth it. The brisket tacos were magnificent. The okra was wonderful. My boyfriend really enjoyed his meal
